messages.question: Which DIN standard does the YAGEO LS219 temperature sensor conform to
messages.answer: The YAGEO LS219 temperature sensor conforms to the DIN EN IEC 60751 standard.
messages.context:
Excerpt 1: YAGEO Nexensos

# LS219, Pt Temperature Sensor according to DIN EN IEC 60751

Temperature range -50 °C to +150 °C

Designed for low temperature applications

Optimized for soldering connection

High accuracy and interchangeability

Excellent long term stability and low drift

LS series Pt-RTDs are designed for high volume low temperature applications where long term stability, interchangeability and accuracy are vital. Typical applications include HVAC, Food and Beverage, Medical and Industrial equipment.

| Nominal Resistance R₀ \[Ω] | Tolerance Class | Order Number | Packaging       |
| -------------------------- | --------------- | ------------ | --------------- |
| Pt100                      | F 0.3 (B)       | 5205115      | VCI-Plastic bag |
| Pt1000                     | F 0.3 (B)       | 5203377      | VCI-Plastic bag |

The measuring point for the nominal resistance is 2 mm from the end of the sensor body.

# Temperature Range of Tolerance Class

---

Excerpt 2: Validity of Class F 0.3 (B) -50 °C to +150 °C

The specified tolerance classes refer to continuous operation.

Short term temperature exposure for soldering: Max. 5 minutes up to 250 °C.

# Dimensions and Tolerances in mm

| L:  | 2.1 -0.2/+0.2  |
| --- | -------------- |
| W1: | 1.9 +0.2       |
| H:  | 0.8 -0.2/+0.25 |
| LL: | 7±1            |
| Lø: | 0.22 ±0.02     |
| W2: | 0.7 ±0.1       |

# Response Time

Air (v = 3 m/s): t0.5 = 1.5 s

t0.9 = 5 s

# Measuring Current

Pt100 Ω: 0.3 to 1 mA

Pt1000 Ω: 0.1 to 0.3 mA (self-heating has to be considered)

Image for illustration purposes only

Color, shape and forming of fixing drop may vary

W2 only valid at outlet spot of wire

YAGEO Nexensos GmbH, Germany Document: 10000002962 Part 001 Version 00 | Status: 03/2025

Web: www.yageo-nexensos.com

Page 1 of 2

Excerpt 3: PJ85775
# ±0.5ᵒC Digital Temperature Sensor with Digital Interface

# In a SOP8/MSOP-8 Package

# GENERAL DESCRIPTION

The PJ85775 is a digital temperature sensor with ±0.5 °C accuracy. Temperature data can be read out directly via digital interface (compatible with SMBus, I²C or 2-wire) by MCU, Bluetooth Chip or SoC chip.

# FEATURES

- Operation Voltage: 1.75 V to 5.5 V
- Average Quiescent Current: 3.0 uA (Typ.) at 1.0 con/s
- Standby Current: 1.0 uA (Typ.)
- Temperature Accuracy without calibration:
- ±0.5 °C from 0 °C to 50 °C
- ±1.0 °C from -20 °C to 85 °C
- ±1.5 °C from -40 °C to 125 °C
- 12 bit ADC for 0.0625 °C resolution
- Compatible with SMBus, 2-wire and I²C interface
- Compatible industry LM75 with performance improved
- Programmable Over/Under Temperature
- Programmable Active Low or High for ALERT pin
- Support SMBus ALERT Response Address (ARA)
- Generate 32 different slave address by setup A0, A1, A2 pin
- Temperature Range: -40 °C to 125 °C

# APPLICATIONS

---

Excerpt 4: | Sensor Address | Description      | I/O Range                    | Holding Register Registration |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| 40001          | Humidity (%RH)   | Min Value: 0 Max Value: 100% | Min (Dec): 0 Max (Dec): 10000 |
| 40002          | Temperature (°C) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40003          | Temperature (°F) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40004          | Dew Point (°C)   |                              |                               |
| 40005          | Dew Point (°F)   |                              |                               |

The temperature = (Modbus register value) ÷ 20. The humidity = (Holding register value) ÷ 100. The dew point = (Holding register value) ÷ 100.

# COMs Settings

---

Excerpt 5: | Sensor Address | Description | I/O Range                    | Comments | Default | Access |
| -------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------- | -------- | ------- | ------ |
| 40601          | Baud Rate   | 0 = 9.6k 1 = 19.2k 2 = 38.4k | 0 = None | 1       | RW     |
| 40602          | Parity      | 0 = None 1 = Odd 2 = Even    |          | 0       | RW     |
